welcome_message_body: Welcome to Paris, the City of Light! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's romantic charm, iconic landmarks, and mouthwatering cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Paris has to offer.

restaurants.name: Sonic Drive-In
restaurants.description: Sonic Drive-In is a fast food restaurant located in Paris.

restaurants.name: Perico's
restaurants.description: Perico's is a mexican restaurant located in Paris.

restaurants.name: Wendy's
restaurants.description: Wendy's is a fast food restaurant located in Paris.

restaurants.name: Long John Silver's
restaurants.description: Long John Silver's is a fast food restaurant located in Paris.

restaurants.name: Jerry's Restaurant
restaurants.description: Jerry's Restaurant is a diner located in Paris.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves private and business flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and most iconic terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, featuring a unique circular design.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, with seven sub-terminals serving a variety of airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost and regional airlines, located a short distance from the main terminals.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
